verses.verse: Rejoice the soul of Your servant, (Ps. 25:1; 143:8) For to You, O Lord, I lift up my soul.
For (Ps. 130:7; 145:9; (Joel 2:13)) You, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive, And abundant in mercy to all those who call upon You.
Give ear, O LORD, to my prayer; And attend to the voice of my supplications.
In the day of my trouble I will call upon You, For You will answer me.
((Ex. 15:11); 2 Sam. 7:22; 1 Kin. 8:23; Ps. 89:6; Jer. 10:6) Among the gods there is none like You, O Lord; Nor are there any works like Your works.
All nations whom You have made Shall come and worship before You, O Lord, And shall glorify Your name.
For You are great, and ((Ex. 15:11)) do wondrous things; (Deut. 6:4; Is. 37:16; Mark 12:29; 1 Cor. 8:4) You alone are God.
